forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a crisp hint of mystery, characteristic of this coastal enclave. The forecast heralds a night where the clouds intermingle playfully with the stars, settling into a gentle evening around 54 degrees. A soft southwest wind, whispering secrets at 7 to 12 mph, enchants the city beneath a veil of partly cloudy skies. As the day gives way to evening, the remnants of the sun's warmth linger just a while longer, before the coolness slips into place, inviting an embrace of comfort.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, a sunny disposition awaits, with the daytime unfurling like a fresh canvas painted in shades of soft gold and azure. Anticipate highs near 64, gradually retreating to the inviting mid-60s as afternoon beckons. The southwest winds will dance a bit stronger, gusting towards 21 mph, carrying with them a teasing hint of the marine layer typical of this season. As fog clings to the edges of the bay, veiling the Golden Gate Bridge in its ethereal grasp, a stroll along the Embarcadero promises a moment of reflection, while the brisk air invites a light jacket, perfect attire for a leisurely exploration of the waterfront.

Find yourself wandering through the less-trodden paths of the Mission, perhaps uncovering a hidden café that serves soulful brews and artisan pastries. Alternatively, a quiet visit to the nearby parks, where the wind rustles through the trees, would be a gentle reminder of nature thriving amidst the urban pulse. Enjoy the soft twilight glow now, for tomorrow the sun shall paint the city anew.
